metadata.description: Self-extending enterprise orchestration system with 69 specialized agents, 19 autonomous workflows, and meta-orchestration capabilities. Create agents, workflows, and skills autonomously.

plugins.name: orchestr8
plugins.description: Complete autonomous software engineering organization with 69 specialized agents, 19 autonomous workflows, enterprise compliance, game development, AI/ML, blockchain/Web3 support, and meta-orchestration capabilities. Self-extending plugin architecture.
